_sText:
Hello.

This map is a shotgun-map. 
You will start with a shotgun, a knife and a handgrenade.
Do not play this with bots, they are to dumb.

Map contains:
Custom skybox made by hipshot.
HDR lighting
24 spawnpoints, 12 on each side.

This is Version 1 of the map, Tell me what to improve.
Thanks to Lost and Fallqvist for helping me with the lighting, There are still some lighting issues, but most of them are gone.

-have fun
--Hamster out
